Class ProtoTypeServer

    public class ProtoTypeServer
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    The Server , Handles all The client request and communicates with the database also every quarter creates reports

        configPath - path server config file
        port - the port to save in the config file

        pass - the database password to save in the config file
